titleStmt.title: The certainty of salvation to them who dye in the Lord a sermon preached at the funeral of the Right Honourable, George Lord Delamer, at Boden, in the county-palatine of Chester, September the 9th, 1684 / by Zachary Cawdrey ...
titleStmt.author: Cawdrey, Zachary, 1616-1684.
